title: U.S. Christmas lights energy costs
summary: This is a bar chart representing Lighting Type in the x axis and Energy cost in U.S. dollars in the y axis.

Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) has the highest Energy cost in U.S. dollars and LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) has the lowest Energy cost in U.S. dollars.

Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) has 453.5 times more Energy cost in U.S. dollars than Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) which is has the lowest.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Lighting Type in the x axis and Energy cost in U.S. dollars in the y axis.

The maximum Energy cost in U.S. dollars 27.21 is found at Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) and the minimum is found at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) where Lighting Type is 0.06.

The maximum Lighting Type Standard incandescent lights (125 lights 4 watts each) has got 453.5 times higher Energy cost in U.S. dollars than the minimum Lighting Type LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each).
The lowest value 0.06 at LED lights (280 lights 0.04 watts each) is almost 2.42 times smaller than the average value 11.27.
Summing up the values of all Lighting Types, we get total 33.8.
